attributes.comment:
I am writing in hope that you will reconsider raising filing fees. As a family currently in the process
of international adoption, we find the financial challenges to be one of the greatest impediments to
adopting a child. Further increases in filing fees will only make these costs even more prohibitive to
families who would like to adopt a child internationally. I hope you will take families like ours into
consideration and choose not to raise the USCIS filing fees.

I am glad that our country gives us opportunities like this, so that our voices may be heard by the
decision-makers. Thank you for reading my comments and carefully weighing this decision!

Erica E. Treat

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Erica E. Treat
